sn8.4:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn8.4:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi ayasmata vangisena pacchasamanena.
sn8.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasmato vangisassa anabhirati uppanna hoti, rago cittam anuddhamseti.
sn8.4:1.4: Atha kho ayasma vangiso ayasmantam anandam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
